doc:
Macdonald Carey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macdonald_Carey 0 Edward Macdonald Carey (March 15, 1913 – March 21, 1994) was an American actor, best known for his role as the patriarch Dr. Tom Horton on NBC's soap opera Days of Our Lives. For almost three decades, he was the show's central cast member.He first made his career starring in various B-movies of the 1940s, 1950s and 1960s (with a few A-picture exceptions like Hitchcock's Shadow of a Doubt). He was known in many Hollywood circles as "King of the Bs", sharing the throne with his "queen", Lucille Ball. Edward_Macdonald_Carey ( March_15_,_1913 – March_21_,_1994 ) was an_American_actor , best_known for his_role as the_patriarch_Dr._Tom_Horton on NBC 's_soap_opera_Days of Our_Lives . He was_known in many_Hollywood_circles as " King of the_Bs " , sharing the_throne with his_"_queen_" , Lucille_Ball .
